channel.title: [PI] Weapons Not in right equitment Slot HELP
channel.description:
ok here my problem i just add arcane stream necky and staff of light client sided and server sided but when i go to wear them both go to my head im really new to adding items please help heres a picture of whats happening
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/5mges.jpg[/img]

item.title: [PI] Weapons Not in right equitment Slot HELP
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

This problem is server-sided. You have to find your Item.java or Item4.Java and add the item ID into everything that it applies to. For example, the Arcane Stream Necklace’s ID would be placed under necklace, amulet, and anything else related to that. The staff of Light shouldn’t need to be placed under anything, so if it already is, remove its ID from Item.java/Item4.java.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Weapons Not in right equitment Slot HELP
